hero.title: Modern Docker
hero.description: A lightweight, powerful Docker management UI focused on simplicity and performance.

features.title: Lightweight Docker Management
features.description: Experience Docker management reimagined - ultra-lightweight and blazing fast. Built with Tauri and Rust, Dockerman uses minimal system resources while delivering instant response times. Streamlined interface with essential features for efficient container management.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Don't hesitate to get in touch with

items.question: Which operating systems does Dockerman support?
items.answer: Dockerman supports macOS, Windows, and major Linux distributions. Built with Tauri and Rust, it provides consistent performance and experience across various operating systems.

items.question: Does Dockerman require an internet connection?
items.answer: Dockerman is a local application that doesn't require an internet connection. It runs entirely on your device, ensuring your data security and privacy.

items.question: Where is SSH data stored?
items.answer: SSH data is stored on your device and is never uploaded to any server.

items.question: What makes Dockerman different from other Docker management tools?
items.answer: Dockerman stands out with its focus on speed and efficiency. It features fast startup times, minimal resource usage (<30MB memory), real-time container monitoring, and a clean, focused interface that prioritizes the most common Docker tasks.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Start managing your Docker containers with a lightweight, powerful desktop experience.

footer.description: A modern, lightweight Docker management UI. Built with love for developers around the world.

pricing.title: Dockerman License
pricing.subtitle: Local Free, Remote Paid
pricing.description: Simple pricing. No subscriptions. Pay once, own it forever.

plans.threeDevicesSaving: 55% off compared to one device license

success.title: Payment Successful!
success.description: Thank you for purchasing Dockerman. Your license key will be sent to your email shortly.
success.step1: Check your email for the license key
success.step2: Download Dockerman if you haven't already
success.step3: Activate your license in the app settings

items.question: What does Lifetime License mean?
items.answer: Purchase once and use Dockerman forever. Your license includes lifetime free updates for all future versions.

items.question: What does Device Limitation mean?
items.answer: You can activate Dockerman on the number of devices specified by your license. You can deactivate a device anytime and transfer the license to another device. If you lose access to a device, you can reset your license to deactivate all devices (limit: once per 7 days).

items.question: Can I use the license on both macOS and Windows?
items.answer: Yes! Your license works on both macOS and Windows. You can mix and match platforms within your device limit.

items.question: Can I use Dockerman for commercial purposes?
items.answer: Absolutely! There are no restrictions on personal or commercial use. You can use Dockerman for any purpose, including in professional and enterprise environments.

items.question: Is there a refund policy?
items.answer: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with Dockerman, email us at support@dockerman.app within 14 days of purchase for a full refund.

items.question: Need more devices?
items.answer: If you need licenses for more than 3 devices, please contact us at support@dockerman.app for custom pricing.

changelog.title: What's New
changelog.description: Keep track of the latest updates, features, and improvements to Dockerman.

about.title: Building the Docker management tool we always wanted
about.description: We're a team of developers and designers who believe that managing Docker containers should be simple, intuitive, and efficient.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: Dockerman was born from our own frustrations with existing Docker management tools. We wanted something that was fast, cross-platform, and focused on developer productivity.
mission.p2: Our mission is to make container management accessible to everyone, from individual developers to large teams, while maintaining the power and flexibility that Docker provides.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.bio: Coding in Rust, TypeScript & Flutter | Turning coffee into software magic | Building to bridge the gap between technology & humanity.

performanceFirst.title: Performance First
performanceFirst.description: Built with Rust and Tauri for powerful performance and minimal resource usage.

developerExperience.title: Developer Experience
developerExperience.description: Intuitive interface designed for developers, by developers.

privacyFocused.title: Privacy Focused
privacyFocused.description: Your data stays local. We believe in transparency and user privacy.

connect.title: Stay Connected
connect.description: Follow Dockerman's development and be the first to know about new features and updates.

snapshot.title: Docker Management,
snapshot.description: A modern, lightweight Docker management UI that focuses on simplicity and performance. Monitor and manage your containers with cross-platform desktop integration.

realTimeMonitoring.name: Real-time Monitoring
realTimeMonitoring.description: Monitor container CPU, memory, network, and I/O metrics in real-time with powerful performance.

containerManagement.name: Container Management
containerManagement.description: Start, stop, inspect, and manage containers with an intuitive interface. Access integrated terminal and process list.

remoteConnectivity.name: Remote Connectivity
remoteConnectivity.description: Connect to remote Docker instances securely via SSH. Manage containers across multiple hosts from a single interface.

powerfulPerformance.name: Powerful Performance
powerfulPerformance.description: Built with Tauri for lightning-fast startup and minimal resource usage while managing your Docker environment.

powerfulPerformance.name: Powerful Performance
powerfulPerformance.description: Built with Tauri and Rust for lightning-fast powerful desktop experience.

realTimeMonitoring.description: Monitor container stats, logs, and resource usage in real-time.

containerManagement.name: Container Management

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: We take your privacy seriously. Here's how we handle your data.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: Dockerman is a desktop application that runs locally on your machine. All container and image data is processed locally through your Docker daemon. We collect minimal, anonymous usage analytics to improve the product (see Analytics section below).

analytics.title: Anonymous Analytics
analytics.content: To understand how users interact with Dockerman and improve the product, we collect anonymous usage data via PostHog. This data is completely anonymous and cannot be used to identify you.
collectedItems: App launch events (app version, operating system)
Feature usage (container, image, compose, network, volume operations)
Docker host connection types (local socket, TCP, SSH)

optOut.title: Opting Out
optOut.content: You can disable analytics at any time in Settings â†’ Privacy. When disabled, no data is collected or transmitted, and any existing session data is cleared immediately.

localStorage.title: Local Storage
localStorage.content: Application settings and preferences are stored locally on your device. These settings are never transmitted to external servers and remain under your control.

updates.title: Updates
updates.content: When checking for application updates, Dockerman only connects to our release repository to verify the latest version. No personal information is transmitted during this process.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about our privacy practices, please feel free to reach out through our support channels.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.description: Please read these terms carefully before using Dockerman. By using Dockerman, you agree to these terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By downloading, installing, or using Dockerman, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree to these terms, do not use the software.

updatesToTerms.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated Terms on our website. Your continued use of Dockerman after such modifications constitutes your acceptance of the updated Terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at

dpa.title: Data Processing Agreement
dpa.description: This agreement outlines how Dockerman processes and protects your data.

overview.title: Data Processing Overview
overview.intro: Dockerman processes data in two main categories:
items: Local data: processed exclusively on your device
Anonymous analytics: collected to improve the product (opt-out available)

categories.title: Data Categories
analyticsItems: App version and operating system type

security.title: Data Storage and Security
security.intro: We implement security measures to protect your data:
items: All analytics data is completely anonymized
No personal identifiers are ever collected
Analytics can be disabled at any time
Local data remains encrypted on your device

purposes.title: Data Processing Purposes
purposes.intro: We process anonymous analytics data for the following purposes:
items: Understanding which features are most used
Identifying areas for improvement
Tracking adoption of new features
Discovering usability issues

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: Anonymous analytics data is retained for product improvement purposes. Since data is anonymous, it cannot be associated with any individual. Local data remains under your control and is stored only on your device.

rights.title: Your Rights
items: Opt out of analytics collection at any time
Use Dockerman without any data collection
Request information about our data practices
Contact us with privacy concerns

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions about data processing or to exercise your rights, please contact us at
